ext.view.title: Project Manager
ext.config.rootPath:
Specify the root directory of the project.

default: `[$HOME/gpm]`. support environment variables

Types:
- string[]: eg `["$HOME/gpm"]`.
- string: string split by `,` eg `"$HOME/gpm, $GOPATH/src"`
ext.config.searchBehavior: Define the behavior of search and select a project.
ext.config.flattenProjects:
Display flattened project in treeview. eg.
- github.com
  - owner_name/project_name
ext.config.cloneArgs: The arguments for ``git clone <arguments>`` when clone project.
